short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sends selected text to PurplePeoplesReader.com when clicked.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This site makes it easy to send selected text to Purple People's Reader where you can get line-by-line translations and audio for languages supported by your browser.
